articles.title: NASA: Massive solar storm hits Earth, sparks VHF radio blackout in Asia, Australia - HT Tech
articles.description: NASA: A huge solar flare erupting on the surface of the Sun sent a solar storm towards the Earth on April 17. The solar storm was so strong that it caused radio blackouts.
articles.content: According to the US Space Weather Prediction Center (SWPC), a powerful solar flare on the surface of the Sun caused radio blackouts in Asia and Australia. On Sunday, April 17, a solar flare peaked an… [+2172 chars]

articles.title: 'I heard her shout: Save me, my hand is gone': 9 commended for fending off Beach Road slasher - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE (The Straits Times/Asia News Network): Nine men who flung objects at a man allegedly hacking his estranged wife with a chopper in Beach Road were on Monday (April 18) commended by the police for helping the bloodied woman fend off her attacker.

articles.title: Justin Bieber is coming to Singapore for a concert in October - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The Peaches singer will perform at the National Stadium on Oct 25 as part of his Justice World Tour. Tickets go on sale on Apr 21.
articles.content:
Justin Bieber has added Singapore to his Justice World Tour as part of his Southeast Asia dates. The pop star will be performing at the National Stadium on Oct 25.

articles.title: 'A big no for me': Potential jurors for Kardashians air disdain to their faces - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Kim Kardashian, her mother Kris Jenner and her sisters Khloe Kardashian and Kylie Jenner are defendants in a lawsuit brought by Rob Kardashian's former fiancee Blac Chyna.
articles.content:
Talking trash about the Kardashians is a common pastime for many ordinary Americans. On Monday (Apr 18), a few got to do it to their faces.

articles.title: Marathoner Soh Rui Yong misses out on Asian Games as Singapore set to send its largest contingent - TODAY
articles.description: SINGAPORE — Singapore is set to send its largest contingent of 382 athletes to the upcoming 19th Asian Games, but without controversial marathoner Soh Rui Yong.
